channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Russia’s war machine is running on fumes as industry warns of bankruptcies and the Kremlin gets old tanks from movie studio
item.description: Russia's largest movie studio donated about 50 tanks and armored vehicles from the 1950s that it had been using a props.

item.title: Trump’s daughter-in-law says she won’t seek US Senate seat
item.description: The president-elect said this week he didn’t expect DeSantis to appoint Lara Trump to the Senate.

item.title: Police Fatally Shoot Man Who Drove Pickup Into Killeen Mall, Injuring 5
item.description: The police said the man was being investigated for possible drunken driving but instead of stopping, he smashed his pickup truck into a J.C. Penney.

item.title: Memes, Jokes and Cats: South Koreans Use Parody for Political Protest
item.description: As South Koreans took to the streets this month demanding the ousting of their president, some found an unexpected outlet to express their fury.

item.title: Niger Buckles Under Relentless Jihadist Fire
item.description: In the West African nation of Niger, killings by insurgents have surged since the military seized power in a coup, expelled U.S. and European troops a...

item.title: Niger Buckles Under Relentless Jihadist Fire

item.title: Trump taps ‘Apprentice’ producer Mark Burnett as special envoy to UK and Tilman Fertitta as Italy ambassador
item.description: Trump also announced casino magnate Tilman Fertitta as his choice to be U.S. ambassador to Italy.

item.title: 3-Minute Christmas Market Rampage Shakes Germany
item.description: At least five people, including a 9-year-old child, were killed in the attack, which took place in the eastern city of Magdeburg. The authorities are ...

item.title: Germany Mourns After Christmas Market Attack
item.description: Germans visited a memorial in Magdeburg, Germany, for the at least five people killed and more than 200 injured at a Christmas market, after an attack...

item.title: Europe Had a Terrible Year, and It’s Probably Going to Get Worse
item.description: The continent’s parlous economy and ascendant far right foretell a grim future.

item.title: Amazon NYC warehouse targeted by Teamsters as strike expands
item.description: Workers at one of Amazon’s air cargo hubs, in San Bernadino, California, were also joining the strike as of Saturday afternoon.

item.title: There’s now a 40% chance the Fed will pivot back to hiking rates again next year, top economist says
item.description: "For investors, it is starting to look similar to 2022—too high inflation, rising interest rates, and falling stock prices."

item.title: ‘Nutcracker’ Is a Casualty of a ‘Quarantine’ of Russian Culture in Lithuania
item.description: Lithuania’s national opera house had stopped showing Tchaikovsky’s 1892 masterpiece in solidarity with Ukraine over the war with Russia. Then a new mi...
